author: perrotta
body:
#### PR description:

The static analyzer pinpointed a few dead assignments in 
- Calibration/HcalCalibAlgos/plugins/HOCalibAnalyzer.cc
- Calibration/HcalCalibAlgos/plugins/HcalIsoTrkAnalyzer.cc 

Instead of opening an issue with them, I found faster to propose here how to remove them.
If this proposal is accepted by @cms-sw/alca-l2 and the HCAL DPG contacts (@abdoulline @igv4321), it can be even merged as such. Otherwise, just consider it as a reminder for dealing with them in a supposedly more appropriate way

#### PR validation:

It compiles. No changes at all are expected, as only dead parts of the code have been removed
title: Resolve a few dead assignments in CalibrationHcalCalibAlgos plugins
